attributes.action: Put A GAG ON THE MEDIA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PUT A GAG ON THE MEDIA ABOUT THE CREDIT CRUNCH.ALL THE BAD COVERAGE DOES NOT HELP BUT MAKES THINGS WORSE AND TRY GIVING SOME GOOD NEWS FOR A CHANGE.

WE DONT WANT TO HEAR ABOUT THE CREDIT CRUNCH 18 TIMES IN EVERY NEWS BULLETIN.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
